featured.text: They performed magical tricks to entertain people.
The “Cups and Balls” trick has been performed for about 1,700 years.
Especially when a burger craving hits…a GreenBurger does the trick.
Amir was very much ___(35)___ by the donkey’s trick, but did not know what to do.

other.text: Amir tried to get to the market on the following days, but the donkey ___(34)___ the same trick and ruined the salt.
The “Cups and Balls” trick which he was particularly good at is still performed by magicians all over the world today.
To trick the monkeys into the belief that there is plenty of space around.
Their brain is 28 tricked into thinking they are eating more than they really are.

definition.zh_def: 一種欺騙或惡作劇的行為，通常用來娛樂或使人困惑。
definition.en_def: A deceptive act or scheme, often intended to amuse or confuse.
definition.example: He played a trick on his friend by hiding his shoes.
